scenario_name: Nimbus Analytics – Real‑Time Cohort Attribution Dashboard Launch
company_context: Nimbus Analytics is a SaaS company (Series B, $120M ARR) that provides advanced analytics for mid‑market e‑commerce merchants. The new feature, **Real‑Time Cohort Attribution Dashboard**, lets product managers view live cohort performance, attribute revenue to marketing channels instantly, and run A/B tests on the fly. Target customers are e‑commerce brands with >$5M annual revenue that need faster insight into marketing ROI. Value proposition: "Turn marketing spend into real‑time revenue insights, so you can optimize campaigns before the day ends."
meeting_event_details: Launch Readiness Review – 2025‑11‑17, 09:00‑10:30 AM PST (90 min) via Zoom (Meeting ID: 842 123 4567). Follow‑up syncs are scheduled weekly on Thursdays at 14:00 UTC until launch. The official public launch is scheduled for **2025‑12‑15 at 10:00 AM PST** (Pacific Time), streamed live on the company’s YouTube channel and recorded for on‑demand.
stakeholders: Lena Ortiz – Senior Product Manager (Feature owner, defines scope, success metrics)
Raj Patel – Engineering Lead, Backend (Responsible for data pipeline integration, performance testing)
Mia Chen – QA Lead (Test plan, regression suite, release gate)
Sofia Delgado – Marketing Manager (Go‑to‑market strategy, content creation, email & social)
Tom Becker – Demand Generation Lead (Paid media, webinar promotion, ABM list)
Jordan Lee – Sales Enablement Manager (Sales playbook, training, demo scripts)
Aisha Khan – Customer Support Manager (Support playbook, tier‑1 FAQ, escalation matrix)
Ethan Ross – Finance Analyst (Launch budget tracking, ROI reporting)
Nina Patel – Data Engineering Manager (Upstream data pipeline release, dependency coordination)
Legal & Compliance – Carla Mendes (Data privacy review, GDPR/CCPA sign‑off)
deliverables: API Reference Update (including new cohort endpoints) – 2025‑12‑01
Internal Training Deck for Sales & Support – 2025‑12‑06
success_criteria: 30 % of existing customers adopt the dashboard within 60 days of launch
Generate $500 k incremental ARR in the first 90 days
Reduce churn among target segment by 5 % YoY
Support tickets related to the feature ≤ 2 per 100 active users in the first 30 days
System latency ≤ 200 ms for real‑time cohort queries under peak load
Achieve 80 % completion rate for sales & support training modules
constraints: Total launch budget capped at $150 k (marketing spend, content production, vendor fees)
Feature depends on upstream data pipeline (Data Lake v3) release – must be in production by 2025‑12‑01
Performance testing must certify < 200 ms latency; any regression triggers a release hold
Legal compliance review (GDPR/CCPA) must be signed off before any public communication
Engineering resources limited to 2 full‑time devs and 1 QA engineer for the final sprint
Risk: Potential data latency spikes during high‑traffic holiday season (Nov‑Dec)
Risk: Incomplete sales enablement could delay customer demos, impacting adoption
workback_prompt: Create a detailed workback plan for Nimbus Analytics' Real‑Time Cohort Attribution Dashboard launch. The plan should cover a T‑30 horizon (starting 2025‑11‑15) with high complexity, listing all milestones, owners, dependencies, risk mitigation steps, and required resources to deliver the listed deliverables, meet the success criteria, and stay within the constraints.
